List cached databases

Source: R/PrepareDB.R
ListDB.Rd

Retrieves information about databases based on a given species and database name.

Usage

ListDB(species = "Homo_sapiens", db = NULL)

Arguments

species

The species for which to retrieve database information. Default is "Homo_sapiens".

db

The pattern to match against the database names. Default is NULL, which matches all databases.

Value

A data frame containing information about the databases.

See also

PrepareDB

Examples

ListDB(species = "Homo_sapiens")
#> [1] identifier version    comment    timestamp  date       db_version db_name   
#> [8] file      
#> <0 rows> (or 0-length row.names)
ListDB(species = "Mus_musculus", db = "GO_BP")
#>                                                         identifier version
#> 1 Rcache v0.1.7 (R package R.cache by Henrik Bengtsson)              0.1.7
#>                                 comment  timestamp                       date
#> 1 3.21.0 nterm:15445|Mus_musculus-GO_BP 1758373968 2025-09-20 13:12:47.896837
#>           db_version            db_name
#> 1 3.21.0 nterm:15445 Mus_musculus-GO_BP
#>                                                                    file
#> 1 /home/runner/.cache/R/R.cache/09126d217b75a645561f00b7375651ed.Rcache
